auth.brandTagline: AI-powered course content generation with seamless Google Drive integration
auth.feature1: Generate complete course modules with AI

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Get started with AI-powered course generation
signup.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
signup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

app.title: Course Content Generator
app.subtitle: AI-powered course content generation with Google Drive integration

workflowSelection.authStep1: 1. A Google sign-in page has opened in a new tab.
workflowSelection.authStep3: 3. After approving, copy the authorization code from the browser URL bar
workflowSelection.authStep4: 4. Paste only the code value below.
workflowSelection.selectMethodDesc: Choose how you want to create your course content
workflowSelection.fromGoogleDocDesc: Use an existing Google Doc with your course index structure
workflowSelection.fromCourseTitleDesc: AI generates module structure from your course title
workflowSelection.fromTxtFileDesc: Upload a text file with your module structure
workflowSelection.helpGoogleDoc: Best if you already have a structured course index in Google Docs.
workflowSelection.helpCourseTitle: Best for starting from scratch - AI will help you structure your course.
workflowSelection.helpTxtFile: Best if you have module lists in text format.

home.configInvalid: Backend configuration is invalid. Please check your .env file.
home.connectFailed: Failed to connect to backend server. Is it running on port 3456?
home.enterFileIdDesc: Enter the File ID of your course index document (Word doc or Google Doc)
home.fileIdHint: Find the ID in the URL: drive.google.com/file/d/
home.pleaseEnterFileId: Please enter a Google Drive File ID
home.step1: Enter the Google Drive File ID of your course index
home.step2: The system reads and parses the document
home.step3: Content is generated for each topic using AI
home.step4: Results are saved to Google Drive

titleInput.generateStructureDesc: Enter your course title and AI will generate a complete module structure for you
titleInput.courseTitleHint: Be specific - include the topic, level, or target audience if relevant
titleInput.example1: Fundamentals of Stock Market Investing for Beginners
titleInput.example2: Digital Marketing: From Zero to Expert
titleInput.nextStep1: AI analyzes your course title and generates a module structure
titleInput.nextStep2: You can review, edit, and customize the generated modules
titleInput.nextStep3: Export the structure as a TXT file for future use
titleInput.nextStep4: Generate the full course content and save to Google Drive

fileUpload.importDesc: Upload a TXT file containing your course module structure
fileUpload.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop your TXT file here
fileUpload.courseTitlePlaceholder: Enter course title or leave empty to auto-detect
fileUpload.formatNote: Each module should start with "Module N:" followed by the title. Description, Topics, Objectives, and Duration fields are optional.

moduleEditor.generateInfo: This will generate complete content for all {{count}} modules and save to Google Drive

promptEditor.pageDescription: Customize the AI prompts used for content generation. Click Save to persist your changes.
promptEditor.moduleGenerationDesc: Used when generating course module structure from a title
promptEditor.topicIndexDesc: Used to generate the structured outline for each topic
promptEditor.topicDevelopmentDesc: Used to generate the full content for each topic
